text: Éric Cubilier (born May 9, 1979 in Nice) is a French former professional footballer who played as a defender. He was a member of the County of Nice national football team at the 2014 ConIFA World Football Cup.La Selecioun Countea de Nissa Football Association. title: Éric Cubilier
